definition: to attract/to arouse/to tick/to strike out/to delineate/to collude/variant of 鉤|钩[gou1], hook
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: She demeans herself by doing his dirty work.
sentences.chinese: 她替他干卑鄙的勾当，贬低了自己的人格。

sentences.english: Investing is the use of capital to acquire assets such as buildings and equipment.
sentences.chinese: 投资勾当与投资购建资产例如建筑物和装备相关。

sentences.english: I have washed my hands of the whole sordid business .
sentences.chinese: 我已经彻底洗手不干所有的肮脏的勾当了。

sentences.english: The pertinent self-disciplinary organizations shall conduct self-disciplinary administration on the introduction business in pursuance of the law.
sentences.chinese: 相关自律性构造依法对介绍营业勾当履行自律管理。

sentences.english: This shopping mall is having a big clearance sale.
sentences.chinese: 这家购物商场正进行清仓大拍卖勾当。

sentences.english: The girl had found out about the goings-on in the factory .
sentences.chinese: 这个女孩已经发现了工厂里的勾当。

sentences.english: To go upon a smuggling expedition is an act of barratry.
sentences.chinese: 从事走私勾当是非法行为。

sentences.english: I know you are too great a gentleman to do a bastardly thing like that.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，你是个君子，绝不会干出这种小人的勾当。

sentences.english: I've washed my hands of the whole sordid business.
sentences.chinese: 我已经洗手不干那种肮脏的勾当了。

sentences.english: A. They get so much practice screwing people.
sentences.chinese: 他们有太多干人的勾当。

sentences.english: That newspaper story blew the lid off the Senator’s illegal business deals.
sentences.chinese: 报纸的报道揭发了参议员的非法勾当。

sentences.english: Welcome to the opening ceremony of the photo exhibition "Expo 2010 Shanghai, China".
sentences.chinese: 接待列位出席“上海世博会图片展”揭幕式勾当。

sentences.english: He was using his business activities as a screen for crime.
sentences.chinese: 他用生意活动作掩护干着犯罪的勾当。

sentences.english: That newspaper story blew the lid off the Senator's illeging shuttle business organiz deings.
sentences.chinese: 报纸的报道讦发了参议员的犯罪勾当。

sentences.english: The world doesn’t need another drama about adultery.
sentences.chinese: 这个世界也用不着戏剧去表演偷鸡摸狗的勾当了。

sentences.english: He resigned rathan then took part in such a dishonest transaction.
sentences.chinese: 他宁愿辞职也不参与这样骗人的勾当。

definition: to imitate the dog and steal chicken (idiom)/to pilfer/to dally with women/to have affairs
to offend Heaven and reason (idiom); bloody atrocities that cry to heaven/outrageous acts
to kill and burn (idiom); murder and arson
to kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
to break into a house for robbery (idiom)
to oppress the people/to act tyrannically
to break the law and violate discipline (idiom)
to break the law and commit crimes (idiom); malefactor/evildoer/to perpetrate outrages
